GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: sends a single article to the client

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: add a comment for an article and responds with the posted comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment by comment_id returns status 204 and no content

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by article_id and returns updated article

GET /api/users.description: returns an array of user objects

GET /api/users/:username.description: returns an object containing a single user

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: update the votes on a comment given the comment's comment_id returns the updated comment

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles.description: adds a new article to articles and responds with the posted article

POST /api/topics.description: adds a new topic and responds with an object for the new topic
